attributes.richTextValue:
We have provided a wide range of Buchwald ligands and precatalysts for nearly 20 years. Our license allows us to provide this technology for R&D and commercial applications. We have continued to add to this product line in order to better serve our customers and allow them to achieve their research and commercial objectives. (See the article New Palladium Precatalysts For Cross-Coupling Reactions By Nicholas C. Bruno and Stephen L. Buchwald, reproduced from: The Strem Chemiker Vol. XXVII No.1}


Click here for a complete list of Buchwald ligands and precatalysts.

• Generation 1
  • Generation 2
  • Generation 3
  • Generation 4

attributes.text: The Strem Chemiker XXVII, No. 1 (Our Technical Publication)
